<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Zyphus (The Grim Harvestman)](/Deities.aspx?ID=160)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Set pointless traps, spread nihilism, encourage deadly accidents

**Anathema** Spread hope, provide aid to Pharasmins

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17)

**Favored Weapon** [Pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=50), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=51), [Undeath](/Domains.aspx?ID=34)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ill Omen](/Spells.aspx?ID=696)

- **2nd**
[Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=279)

- **6th**
[Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218)

</column>
name: Zyphus (The Grim Harvestman)
